title: Edge of the Empire - GM Screen
description:
This is a high quality scan of the Edge of the Empire GM Screen. There's a depressing lack of PDFs for these books online, so I decided to make this available.

PDF is searchable, but Acrobat's OCR tech is rather lame. Best I could do given the software I have access to at the moment. Also, the PDF isn't optimized; I found I would rather have crisper text (at 10 megs) than blurry text (at 2 megs). If size is an issue, you can just run this through a PDF optimizer to get a smaller file.

======================
